name: Rainbow Puke Friends
description:
Roll, move and puke!

Split your friend with rainbow. Survive to win the 1st place!

Control:

Player 1: 

Keyboard: arrow keys to decide rotation direction, o button to shoot
Joy con: stick to decide rotation direction, B button to shoot

Player 2: 

Keyboard: wasd keys to decide rotation direction, v button to shoot.
Joy con: stick to decide rotation direction, B button to shoot.

Player 3: Joy con: stick to decide rotation direction, B button to shoot.

Player 4 :Joy con: stick to decide rotation direction, B button to shoot.
